# Surface Stranger (Trait)
## Overview
**Surface Stranger (Underground):** You were born and raised in a subterranean home with little or no bright light. Your miss chance for concealment or total concealment due to either mundane or magical darkness decreases by 10%. You are [[Dazzled|dazzled]] for 1 round when you are suddenly exposed to bright light.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 63
